subject: Haptic reactors not working
description_text:
I purchased the 3 haptic reactors as well as the pro plus x controller that
was necessary for the haptics. upon delivery i realized that the pedal
cables didnt fit in the pro x controller so i would have to run both
simultaneously to be able to get haptics however my simsonn software does
not like when i plug the second box in with the haptics and it sends my
device into a "simsonn flasher" state in which my "main controller is in
upgrade mode, check if the upgrade button is released and reconnect the usb
to exit" i have tried in every which order of that button being pressed in,
out, etc but the pedals are only recognized if i press the upgrade button
and reconnect my original controller without the haptics the moment i plug
my haptics controller usb in it is back to the flasher mode. any solutions?
i dont want to have to return these
